doc:
Caroline Harris https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Caroline_Harris 0 Caroline Harris (November 11, 1867 – April 23, 1937) was an American actress. She appeared in 12 films between 1909 and 1917. Her last film was The Gulf Between, the first film released in the Technicolor process. Harris was the mother of the American film actor Richard Barthelmess.She died in New York, New York. Caroline_Harris ( November_11_,_1867 – April_23_,_1937 ) was an_American_actress . She appeared in 12_films between 1909_and_1917 . Her_last_film was The_Gulf Between , the_first_film released in the_Technicolor_process . Harris was the_mother of the_American_film_actor_Richard_Barthelmess.She died in New_York , New_York .
